page.title: 05BROADFORD CO-OP
page.content: {The Broadford Co-op}employs six full time staff and two part-timers.The Co-op house (now a cafe) was built in 1942 and the main building was built in 1962.A new extension to the Co-op was built this year.I asked the manager why they needed an extension and he replied,"To bring the shop up to date and give us more room to work in."The hours the Co-op works are half past eight a.m. till half past five p.m. every day of the week except Wednesday when they work 9 a.m. till 1 p.m.The items they sell most are bread,milk and frozen foods.The least sold item is hardware.The manager is Bill Wood.The Co-op is by far the busiest grocery outlet in the Broadford area.
